sentences.sContent: The rubble was then dumped in a municipal landfill site on the outskirts of Florence.
sentences.sContent_eng: The rubble was then dumped in a municipal landfill site on the outskirts of Florence.
sentences.sCn: 这堆碎石后来被倾倒在佛罗伦萨市郊的一处垃圾填埋场。

sentences.sContent: On the outskirts of every city I saw, there was a veritable forest of apartment blocks under construction.
sentences.sContent_eng: On the outskirts of every city I saw, there was a veritable forest of apartment blocks under construction.
sentences.sCn: 在我造访的每个城市的郊区，一栋栋在建公寓楼确实是鳞次栉比。

sentences.sContent: After abandoning his devastated home on the outskirts of Damascus, Mustafa, his wife, children and aging parents spent months seeking safety in one town after another.
sentences.sContent_eng: After abandoning his devastated home on the outskirts of Damascus, Mustafa, his wife, children and aging parents spent months seeking safety in one town after another.
sentences.sCn: 在抛弃大马士革郊区破坏殆尽的家后，穆斯塔法和他的妻子，孩子几年迈的父母花了几个月的时间在一个又一个小镇躲避战祸。

remMethod.val: out(出)+skirts(边缘)→超出城的边缘→郊区

trans.tranOther: the parts of a town or city that are furthest from the centre
